name: HarmonyLauncher
description: HARMONY LAUNCHER, The world’s first IGO + IDO Launchpad & Incubator with an integrated AMM DEX built over the Harmony Blockchain. Harmony Launcher is one amongst those pioneers, who are determined to develop Harmony Network by encouraging and supporting Harmony Based projects, extending our core products for their utilization and development. Harmony Launcher’s Products:- IGO + IDO Launchpad Harmony Incubator Harmony AMM DEX Harmony Launcher’s Aim:- To help Harmony Network based projects to Nourish, Build, Raise funds & launch successfully. To encourage numerous projects to adopt Harmony Network as their core foundation. To Accelerate the utilization & Development of Harmony Blockchain. To permanently put a stop to the unfair allocation system followed by most launchpads. To provide enormous support to every Harmony based projects regardless of their negative factors.
